attributes.action: to eradicate the differences in social, medical and education benefits and funding between Scotland and England which were introduced by the Government following the Devolution of Scotland. These differences discriminate unfairly against the people of England and should be addressed in terms of fairness for all.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Example of this are:

1. University fees, free in Scotland, but payable in England.
2. Medical facilities; many prescriptions are free of charge in Scotland, but payable in England. This also extends to the actual availability of some medications. Available in Scotland, but not  in England.
3.Social care. e.g. care of the elderly, care in the community; free of charge in Scotland, but payable in England.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
